original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1176)@</color>以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(526)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>對自身範圍內敵方造成物理傷害，且在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4774)@</color> 秒內隨機提升全體我方武將 <color=#ccffcc>19%</color> 所有抗性和 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4784)@</color> 點武力以及 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_MS(4779)@</color> 點移動速度，同時隨機對敵方全體武將造成暈眩混亂以及盲目狀態。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1176)@</color> to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(526)@</color> <color=#80cc00>War</color> inflicts physical damage on the enemy within its own range, and randomly raises all our generals within <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4774)@</color> within seconds<color=#ccffcc>19%</color> All resistances and <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4784)@</color> points of force and <color=#ccffcc>$Status_MS(4779)@</color> points of movement speed, At the same time, it randomly stuns and blinds all enemy generals.
